Description:
Maximize the value of your cloud and AI investments by adopting the Microsoft marketplace. In this Office Hours session, you’ll learn how to strategically plan your Microsoft Cloud investments and how your software vendors can gain a consumption-based view of your portfolio to drive smarter, data-informed decisions.

We’ll also walk through pre-committed cloud budgets and explore how the marketplace can help you unlock more value from your existing contracts.

How do I participate?

Add this event to your calendar and select **Attend** to receive reminders. Log in to the Tech Community to post your questions in advance or at any time during the live broadcast.
Author: j_weller_nv
Title: Office hours: Strategic cloud planning with the Microsoft Marketplace
